value.title: Introduction to Python
value.excerpt: Learn how to write basic Python code, declare variables, and work with console input and output

images.title: Introduction to Python

value.title: Overview of identity and access management in Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Learn how identity and access management work in Microsoft 365.

images.title: Overview of identity and access management in Microsoft 365

value.title: Manage device identity with Azure AD join and Enterprise State Roaming
value.excerpt: Evaluate options to manage device identities in Azure AD. Allow users to join devices in Azure AD. Require devices to be marked as compliant. Enable Enterprise State Roaming.

images.title: Manage device identity with Azure AD join and Enterprise State Roaming

value.title: Protect your servers and VMs from brute-force and malware attacks with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: In this module, you’ll discover how to protect VMs and servers with Azure Security Center

images.title: Protect your servers and VMs from brute-force and malware attacks with Azure Security Center

value.title: Implement a Data Warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Azure Synapse Analytics provides a relational big data store that can scale to Petabytes of data. In this learning path, you will learn how Azure Synapse Analytics can achieve this scale with its’ Massively Parallel Processing (MPP) architecture. Create a data warehouse in minutes and use familiar querying language to build reports. Load massive amounts of data in minutes, and ensure that your data warehouse is secure.

topItems.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create a data warehouse in Azure Synapse Analytics in minutes to take advantage of massively parallel processing (MPP) and run complex queries at petabyte scale quickly.

images.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics

topItems.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to issue simple queries against Azure Synapse Analytics and how to visualize the data in both Excel and Power BI.

images.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics

topItems.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
topItems.excerpt: Load petabytes of data into an Azure Synapse Analytics database in minutes by using PolyBase.

images.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics

value.title: Machine learning crash course
value.excerpt: A high-level overview of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning. Modules are aimed at people with little or no knowledge of computer science and statistics. You will cover the essential concepts of AI and learn how to apply custom machine learning solutions with free, easy to use tools. You will learn simple but powerful ways that AI practitioners make predictions about objects, people, and the future. Then, you’ll cover exciting, complex topics you may have heard of, such as neural networks, computer vision, deep learning, and unsupervised learning.

topItems.title: Predict numeric values with regression
topItems.excerpt: Use machine learning regression models to predict numeric values. Build multiple variations of linear regression models to estimate things like internet traffic.

images.title: Predict numeric values with regression

topItems.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks
topItems.excerpt: Use neural network models to make predictions. Change neural network structures to refine predictions using TensorFlow and Keras.

images.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks
Predict numeric values with regression

value.title: Migrate ASP.NET Apps to Azure
value.excerpt: Migrate ASP.NET web applications and their data to Azure App Service and Azure SQL Database to take advantage of the cloud.

topItems.title: Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure with the App Service Migration Assistant
topItems.excerpt: Use the Azure App Service Migration Assistant to assess the readiness of a web app to be deployed on App Service, and perform the migration.

images.title: Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure with the App Service Migration Assistant

topItems.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

images.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure with the App Service Migration Assistant

value.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

images.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs

value.excerpt: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
value.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence

value.title: Communicate between applications with Azure Queue storage
value.excerpt: Implement the publish-subscribe pattern in the cloud using Azure Queue storage.

images.title: Communicate between applications with Azure Queue storage

value.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Set up a continuous integration (CI) pipeline that automates the process of building your application.

images.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines

value.title: Create a Clustering Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Clustering is an unsupervised machine learning technique used to group similar entities based on their features. Learn how to create clustering models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Understand the structure of role definitions for access control. Identify the role properties to use that define your custom role permissions. Create a custom Azure role and assign to a user.

images.title: Create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)

value.title: Create a Regression Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Regression is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict numeric values. Learn how to create regression models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Describe concepts of relational data
value.excerpt: Explore the relational model for databases, how tables are structured, how you can use indexes to improve query performance, and how you can use views to simplify complex queries.

images.title: Describe concepts of relational data

value.title: Explore concepts of non-relational data
value.excerpt: Learn about non-relational databases, and how they compare to relational databases. Understand the different types of non-relational databases commonly used by applications.

images.title: Explore concepts of non-relational data

value.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
value.excerpt: Load petabytes of data into an Azure Synapse Analytics database in minutes by using PolyBase.

images.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase

value.title: Predict categories with machine learning classification
value.excerpt: Use machine learning models to categorize data. Build a logistic regression model and support vector machine models to predict categories like win/loss and tree species.

images.title: Predict categories with machine learning classification

value.title: Predict numeric values with regression
value.excerpt: Use machine learning regression models to predict numeric values. Build multiple variations of linear regression models to estimate things like internet traffic.

images.title: Predict numeric values with regression

value.title: Manage access to an Azure subscription by using Azure role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: To grant access to a subscription, identify the appropriate role to assign to an employee. Understand when you might need to temporarily elevate your own access to regain access to a subscription.

value.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
value.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

value.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints
value.excerpt: Network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

images.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints

value.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database
value.excerpt: Learn how to add data to your database and query NoSQL data in Azure Cosmos DB.

images.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database

value.title: Align requirements with cloud types and service models in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure supports three approaches to deploying cloud resources - public, private, and the hybrid cloud. Selecting between them will change several factors of the services you move into Azure including cost, maintenance requirements, and security. In this module, we will look at all three types and help you make an informed decision about which one to leverage for your services. We'll also quickly look at the service models supported by Azure which can help you determine the services you should start with when planning out an Azure deployment.

images.title: Align requirements with cloud types and service models in Azure

value.title: Enable automatic updates in a web application using Azure Functions and SignalR Service
value.excerpt: Update a web app's notification mechanism from polling to push-based architecture with SignalR Service, Azure Cosmos DB and Azure Functions.

value.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure networking in a secure way for your Azure virtual machines.

images.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines

value.title: Control authentication for your APIs with Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Discover how to protect your APIs from unauthorized use with API keys and client certificate authentication.

images.title: Control authentication for your APIs with Azure API Management

value.excerpt: Introduction to adding conversational intelligence to your apps by using language understanding (LUIS)
